${ModID}:Attraction.NAME: Attraction
${ModID}:Attraction.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and ${ModID}:Magnetize them. NL Add a *Fuzz to your hand.

${ModID}:CoilBurst.NAME: Coil Burst
${ModID}:CoilBurst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 2 *Fuzz to your hand.

${ModID}:FaradayField.NAME: Faraday Field
${ModID}:FaradayField.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Magnetize your entire hand.

${ModID}:Ferroshield.NAME: Ferroshield
${ModID}:Ferroshield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When you ${ModID}:Magnetize this card, gain [E] [E].

${ModID}:Fuzz.NAME: Fuzz
${ModID}:Fuzz.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if ${ModID}:Magnetized. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Hyperpolarity.NAME: Hyperpolarity
${ModID}:Hyperpolarity.DESCRIPTION: The next ${ModID}:Magnetized card you play this turn is played twice. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Hyperpolarity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next ${ModID}:Magnetized card you play this turn is played twice.

${ModID}:InduceCurrent.NAME: Induce Current
${ModID}:InduceCurrent.DESCRIPTION: When you ${ModID}:Magnetize a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:OhmicPush.NAME: Ohmic Push
${ModID}:OhmicPush.DESCRIPTION: Apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Distortion and !M! Weak. NL Add a *Fuzz to your hand.

${ModID}:PerfectedAlignment.NAME: Perfected Alignment
${ModID}:PerfectedAlignment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase by !M! for ALL your ${ModID}:Magnetized cards.

${ModID}:Superconductance.NAME: Superconductance
${ModID}:Superconductance.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Magnetized cards deal !M! more damage and gain !M! more Block this turn.

${ModID}:WorldDynamo.NAME: World Dynamo
${ModID}:WorldDynamo.DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn all cards in your hand are ${ModID}:Magnetized, gain [E].
